title: BRIEF-Shriram Transport Finance Company To Consider Debt Issue
text:
BRIEF-Shriram Transport Finance Company To Consider Debt Issue

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Shriram Transport Finance Company To Consider Debt Issue Sept 30 (Reuters) - Shriram Transport Finance Company Ltd : * ISSUE OF DEBT SECURITIES IN ONSHORE/OFFSHORE MARKET BY PUBLIC ISSUE AND/ OR PRIVATE PLACEMENT BASIS * ISSUANCE COMMITTEE WILL BE HELD DURING MONTH ENDING OCTOBER 31, 2019 TO CONSIDER ISSUE PRICE

BRIEF-Shriram Transport Finance Company To Consider Debt Issue
description: BRIEF-Shriram Transport Finance Company To Consider Debt Issue
